posts.post_content:
I have the following cards for trade. 

Looking for:
Tougher backed t206 HOFers GD or better
Bill Dahlen cards
Mike Powers t206 Sovereign 150 VG or better
Ed Foster Piedmont 350 VG/EX or better

If you see something you would like to trade for, let me know.
[url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url]

Thanks
Mike
